name: SimpleTodoApp
description: A simple web-based to-do list application that allows users to add, edit, delete, and mark tasks as completed. The app stores tasks in the browser's local storage so that data persists across sessions without a backend.
features: User can create a new task with a title and optional description
User can mark a task as completed/uncompleted
User can edit an existing task
Filter view to show All, Active, or Completed tasks
Responsive design for desktop and mobile

files.purpose: Root HTML file that loads the React app
Entry point that renders the React application into the DOM
Main application component handling state, UI layout, and routing of features
Component representing a single task with edit, complete, and delete controls
Component that renders a list of TaskItem components based on current filter
Component providing filter buttons (All, Active, Completed)
Utility functions for saving and loading tasks from localStorage
Styling for the application, ensuring responsive layout
Project metadata and dependencies (React, ReactDOM, etc.)
Files/folders to ignore in version control
Documentation on how to install, run, and use the app
